document.full_text: sixteen state attorneys general are urging the pabst brewing company to reduce the alcohol content of a controversial fruit-flavored drink that is getting high-profile promotion from rapper snoop dogg.
document.title: state ags urge pabst to dilute controversial drink
lines_and_colors: sixteen state attorneys general are urging the pabst brewing company to reduce the alcohol content of a controversial fruit-flavored drink that is getting high-profile promotion from rapper snoop dogg.
